key.name: places-icon-size
key.description: Icon size (in pixels) for the "places" grid.

key.name: padding
key.description: The number of pixels left empty (for a lateral dock for example). If the number is negative, the empty space will be at the right of the screen.

key.name: position
key.summary: Where the extension should display its shit

key.name: search-in-path
key.summary: If the search among recent files should be done based on the file path.
key.description: If "true", the search among recent files will be done based on the file path; if "false", it will be based on the file name only.
